content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":25751,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef69da9b-56ee-4b72-bd08-a757e5fe8b53/QE_onboarding_22.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ef69da9b-56ee-4b72-bd08-a757e5fe8b53/QE_onboarding_22.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_22.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_22.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ef69da9b-56ee-4b72-bd08-a757e5fe8b53\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":519,\"height\":152},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SET discipline borders on Test Automation, DevOps and development. SET engineers are responsible for the entire ecosystem of the project in terms of testing. To develop as SET, it is important to have deep expertise and a broad understanding of different disciplines (programming languages, DevOps, automation, etc.). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SET engineers have a wider area of responsibility than test automation engineers:  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Integrating testing into pipelines.  \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Setting up Quality Gates (a set of conditions that a project must meet before it can qualify for production). \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Work with CI/CD processes, etc.  \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Unlike SET, the classic test automation engineers focus on automating tests and integrating it into Continuous Integration to a lesser extent. They often take over part of manual testing. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Growth in the SET direction usually starts from Senior Test Automation engineer and above. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" about SET you can on the Knowledge base \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/GDOKB/FAQ+SET\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For questions about SET, you can contact \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Mihail_Bayaryn?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mihail Bayaryn\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Aliaksandr_Mazhar?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Aliaksandr Mazhar\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
